text: :bulb: add a 4th argument to the `replace` hubl filter to control whether the find/replace should be case sensitive or not.
Would also love Regex support in the |replace filter as well :X

Forgot the variable name, but in custom modules it’d be nice if there was a link/button to copy the snippet for the module instance variable (the module id).

To clarify - the id of the specific instance of the module in a page. sometimes used to make it so multiple instances of the same module in a page don’t cause problems. Specifically get’s used for javascript sometimes.
